item.title: Kubernetes Ceph RBD for dynamic provisioning
item.description: In this post I will show you how can you use CEPH RBD for persistent storagi on Kubernetes.

item.title: Install kubernetes with kubeadm
item.description: Kubeadm is a tool that helps you bootstrap a simple Kubernetes cluster and simplifies the deployment process.

item.title: Install privacyIDEA
item.description: privacyIDEA is a Two Factor Authentication System which is multi-tenency- and multi-instance-capable. It is opensource, written in Python and hosted at GitHub.

item.title: Install PostgreSQL 10
item.description: Nextcloud is a suite of client-server software for creating and using file hosting services. Nextcloud application functionally is similar to Dropbox.
